name: Treasure Trove Through Time
description:
Ages ago, the fearless Captain Cara Mansa buried a precious treasure on a remote island. Generations later, a brave young individual discovers the possible whereabouts of this hidden treasure. Now it's up to you to remember where Cara Mansa buried his treasure and help our hero achieve their goal! But beware! Over the years, the island has gone through drastic changes and doesn't look quite the same...

Enjoy this voxel style game and explore a detailed island in search for the perfect hiding spot for a special treasure. You can even challenge your friends to see if they paid close attention to where you hid it!

_________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

Use WASD: to move around the island.

MOUSE3: (Scroll wheel) zooms in and out.

RMB: rotates the camera.

LMB: selects where you want to bury or dig
